Translations.Text: bilog geudeul-i seologa seololeul andahayeodo geuleohal geos-imyeo joein deul-eun geunal-ui eungbeol-eul pihagi wiha yeo geuui jason-ina
daejie issneun modeun geos-eul bachyeogeu eungbeol-eul pihalyeo hadoda
geuleona gyeolko geuleohge doel su eobs-eumyeo buljiog-i iss-eul ppun-eulo
jaeang-i ileul ttaemyeon keuge seulpeo hamyeo
geuleona yebaee chungsilhan jadeul eun geuleohji anihani
guhaneun jadeul-ina guhaji a nihan jadeul-eul wihae sayonghago
sillo hananim-ui eungbeol-eun bulga pihan geos-idoe
geuleona anaedeulgwa geudeul-ui o leun son-i soyuhan jadeul-eun heolagdoen geos-idoe
geuleona ileul wibanhan geos-eun bul-uihan jadeul-ila
sin-yong-eul jikigo yagsog-eul ihaeng haneun jadeulgwa
geuleona geudae juwileul geubhi seodulleo doljinhaneun bulsinjadeul-egeneun eotteon il-i issgessneunyo
oleunjjoggwa oenjjog-eseo wae tteji eo anj-a issneunyo
geudeul gagjaneun chugbogbad-eun cheongug eulo deul-eogalyeo galmanghaneunyo
gyeolko geuleohge doel su eobsnani hananim-eun geudeul-i algo issneun geos-eu lo changjohayeossnola
